text:
Vicarious AI | https://www.vicarious.com/careers/

In addition to AI researchers, we're looking for the following (fulltime onsite in San Francisco area):

- Senior SW Engineer -- robotics and computer vision

- Senior SW Engineer -- data and application services

- Graphics Developer / Visualization Scientist

- IT Engineer

Some of the perks: private chef for all meals, unlimited vacation, company phone plan, massages, free week getaway to Hawaii every year for you and your family.

Please apply directly (referencing this post and saying Alex sent you).
